actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to repeal the deduction limitation which applies to State legislators who reside within 50 miles of the capitol building of the State.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to repeal the limitation on travel expense deductions applicable to State legislators who reside within 50 miles of their State capitol.

titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to repeal the deduction limitation which applies to State legislators who reside within 50 miles of the capitol building of the State.
